1/**
2 @file
3 @brief Choose the username from available variables
4
5**/
6%macro setMetaperson();
7%put _METAPERSON:[&_METAPERSON];
8%put _METAUSER:[&_METAUSER];
9%put SYSUSERID:[&SYSUSERID];
10
11%if %length(&_METAPERSON) eq 0 %then %do;
12 %if %length(&_METAUSER) eq 0 %then %do;
13 %IF %LENGTH (&SYSUSERID) eq 0 %THEN %DO;
14 %let _METAPERSON =usuario no encontrado;
15 %END;
16 %else %do;
17 %let _METAPERSON =&SYSUSERID;
18 %end;
19 %end;
20 %else %do;
21 %let _METAPERSON =&_METAUSER;
22 %end;
23%end;
24%else %do;
25%let _METAPERSON =&_METAUSER;
26%end;
27%mend setMetaperson;
